name: Stranded Rescue
description:
You are stranded on a haunted spaceship, drifting through an asteroid belt in the most desolate part of space. Fend of the ghosts and take control of the spaceship to avoid asteroids. The goal? Survive for as long as possible, and hope there is help out there.

WASD - Move

Mouse Movement - Aim

Left Mouse - Shoot

Spacebar (near cockpit control panel) - Toggle Control of Spaceship
